quotes.quote: There is no pain so great as the memory of joy in present grief.
Like a bird singing in the rain, let grateful memories survive in time of sorrow
The art of losing isn't hard to master; so many things seem filled with the intent to be lost that their loss is no disaster.
Any mind that is capable of real sorrow is capable of good.
Only a moment you stayed, but what an imprint your footprints have left on our hearts.
He spoke well who said that graves are the footprints of angels.
A great soul serves everyone all the time. A great soul never dies. It brings us together again and again.
May flight of Angels sing thee to thy rest.
No matter how prepared you think you are for the death of a loved one, it still comes as a shock, and it still hurts very deeply.
Those we love and lose are always connected by heartstrings into infinity
Learn from each one of your defeats; your losses must be as close to you as your victories.
When you lose someone you love, you gain an angel you know.
We should feel sorrow, but not sink under its oppression.
Life is eternal and love is immortal; And death is only a horizon, And a horizon is nothing save the limit of our sight.
You learn more from your losses, than from your gains.
There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
When the heart grieves over what is has lost, the spirit rejoices over what it has left.
Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
You can't truly heal from a loss until you allow yourself to really FEEL the loss.
The Remembrance of the good done those we have loved is the only consolation when we have lost them.
Remember me with smiles and laughter, for that is how I will remember you all. If you can only remember me with tears, then don't remember me at all.
What we have once enjoyed we can never lose...All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
In the night of death, hope sees a star, and listening love can hear the rustle of a wing.
When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult.
Heaven knows we need never be ashamed of our tears, for they are rain upon the blinding dust of earth, overlying our hard hearts.
We understand death only after it has placed its hands on someone we love.
We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
Bear and endure: This sorrow will one day prove to be for your good.
Grieve not, nor speak of me with tears, but laugh and talk of me as if I were beside you. I loved you soâ€”it was heaven here with you.
